definitions.body: sf. [[וּתְשֻׁבָתוֹ הָרָמָ֫תָה]] 1Sa 7:17 and his return was (= he returned) to Rama.
esp. cstr. [[לִתְשׁוּבַת]] [[הַשָּׁנׇה]] at the return of the year, i.e. of spring, 2Sa 11:1, 1Ki 20:22, 1Ki 20:26, 2Ch 36:10, ´[[הַשּׁ]] :´[[לְעֵת תְּשׁ]]: 1Ch 20:1 (‖ 2Sa 11:1).
answer, pl. abs. [[תְּשֻׁבׂת]] Job 34:36, sf. [[תְּשׁוּבׂתֵיכֶם]] Job 21:34.
